page.title: 03BRICKYARDS POND,COTEHILL
page.content: Near the brickyards there is a place where you can fish.The brickyards is a place where they used to make bricks for houses.You are not allowed to walk round.You are only allowed to go in if you are going to fish.There is a sign that says "Tresspassers will be prosecuted".People used to be able to walk round.It used to be a little pond.I used to get tadpoles there.They dug up the sides to make the pond deeper.It had lots of trees round it but all the trees have cut down.Then they pumped more water into the pond then they breed some fish then put them into the pond.You have to pay to get in.It costs Â£4 to catch two fish per day and Â£8 to catch four fish.
